::Optimus Prime::

    He grabbed the tail and picked up the raptor. "You w=
ill listen to me. Do you even know who I am? I am Optimus Prime, the leader=
 of the Autobots, the holder of the Matrix of Leadership."
    He transform=
ed to truck mode, Razor Claw falling inside the cab section. "Follow me."
 =
   He took off once again towards the CF.

(He was holding him during trans=
formation.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 6:07 PM
  Subject: Re:=
 Dachande respond or else


  Razor Claw released his sword glaring at Opti=
mus Prime and Eclipse. He transformed to Raptor to even the odds if necessa=
ry. "You ran from a battle while other Maximals risked both spark and limb =
to protect it." The angry Raptor wan't in his right mind, he was suffering =
an imbalance brought on by Veratis' virus. His thoughts were one sided and =
could only see his form of reason. 

  He was the mighty raptor and these f=
our were no more than lowly prey to be consumed. it didn't matter if he bel=
ieved thier story. The desertion was merely an excuse to lash out and look =
tough. Lash out he did swinging his powerful tail at Optimus, slashin a cla=
w from his left foot at Eclipse and snapping his jaws at Wolveritron.
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 8:19 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande=
 respond or else


    ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

       =
 Optimus Prime reached out and grabbed the sword, just holding it there.
  =
      "There will be no bloodshed today," Prime said. "Whatever these bots =
did, I'm sure they have their reasons. Please allow them to explain."
     =
   Eclipse looked at the bot and shifted to his most powerful form, the Wer=
ewolf. "We left the Cybertronian Fire because our work will not benifit if =
I am destroyed. The Alliance was coming dangeroudly close to destroying the=
 CF. I had to get out. I am now returning to the CF, with Optimus Prime, he=
re."
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 11:51 AM
    =
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      Razor Claw stood unmoving, =
staring Wolveritron down.

      "You don't fight back?" he glared at the d=
eserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

      "You do not fight then you admit your=
 guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a backslashing motion at a level=
 to decapitate Wolveritron.


        ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
 From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursd=
ay, February 01, 2001 9:31 PM
        Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else=



        Razor Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out o=
f this, you are not part of the accused or a viable witness so you have no =
say in what happens to these deserters."

        The mutant wasn't exactly=
 what bots would consider sane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize h=
is double transformation but was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe=
 it was the virus, maybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was =
just sickened by bots who'd run from a battle and leave thier comrades to s=
uffer the pains of battle.

        "Now for business I was dealing with yo=
u!" he reached out and poked Wolveritron in the chestplate trying to pursue=
 his issues.


          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dach=
ande 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, Febru=
ary 01, 2001 1:57 PM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    =
      ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

              They had n=
ot heard Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they heard him the second time. P=
rime was walking away, but he stopped and came back.
              "Is ther=
e something you need from us?" Prime asked.
            ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
            Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
            Su=
bject: Re: Dachande respond or else


            It all started back when.=
..


               ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: dacha=
nde 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, Dece=
mber 18, 2000 7:40 PM
              Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramu=
s


              ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

                  They had=
 heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the con=
flict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and tog=
ther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away

           =
   So I responded with...
              . 
              Razor Claw saw the=
 three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping a=
lliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahe=
ad. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He tra=
nsformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will sto=
p or you will be forced to, your choice."

              Then a few more po=
sts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doe=
sn't know enough about Prime to recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, and Ecli=
pse were finally together. and Razor Claw caught up with them.(I can't find=
 the cave posting I thought it was those three that were in the same cave a=
s Vuloise.)

              He aproached the three bots ready for battle and=
 hoping that things won't be ended peacefully











        Yahoo! Gro=
ups Sponsor 
             
              Grab the opportunity to market you=
r company. Choose the domain name below and press GO! 
                    =
www.
